entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is a student at Hogwarts who has been cursed. She is not the intended target of the curse, but rather an unintended victim.

entities.name: st mungo's hospital for magical maladies and injuries
entities.description: St Mungo's Hospital is a place where wizards and witches go to receive treatment for magical ailments. Katie was taken there after being cursed.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who has been investigating the possibility that Draco Malfoy is a Death Eater.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate at Hogwarts. He and Hermione are pretending to be deaf when Harry mentions his theory about Malfoy being a Death Eater.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend and classmate at Hogwarts. She and Ron are pretending to be deaf when Harry mentions his theory about Malfoy being a Death Eater.

entities.name: leanne
entities.description: Leanne is a student at Hogwarts who knows that Katie was not the intended target of the curse.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who Harry suspects may be a Death Eater. He is aware of the curse on Katie, but it's unclear if he knows more about it.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who has been absent for a while. He returns to teach his lesson on Monday night and seems tired but smiling.

relationships.entity_2: st mungo's hospital for magical maladies and injuries
relationships.description: Katie was taken to St Mungo's Hospital after being cursed.
Harry suspects that Malfoy may be a Death Eater and is aware of the curse on Katie.
Dumbledore is Harry's teacher at Hogwarts, and he returns to teach his lesson on Monday night.
